document_data.name: Curse of Irphong
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Curse of Irphong''' can refer to either of the two creatures that inhabited the lair underneath Irphong island in the Nelanther Isles.

A [[dragon turtle]] was the first to be known by this name. It was one of the oldest and largest of its kind. It was slain by a [[kraken]] in [[1363 DR]].

The kraken appropriated the dragonâ€™s name and treasures. It now attack ships that pass through the region, especially those that travel alone and at night.
document_data.Lair: Its lair is accessed through an underwater entrance in a sea-cove entrance on the north side of the island. The 1500 foot underwater passage leads to the center of the island, where the treasure is kept.
